title: Changes in Educational Roles and Response Strategies for Pharmacy Faculty in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of pharmaceutical education systems and basic pedagogy
context.additional_context: Analysis of post-pandemic remote education transition cases in pharmaceutical education and exploration of practical implementation strategies

learning_goals: Learners can explain three major educational barriers experienced by pharmacy faculty during the pandemic
Learners can design effective operational strategies for practice-oriented courses in remote education environments
Learners can propose pharmacy education improvement plans including academic integrity measures and workload management strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
